changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Discover the latest changes and improvements made to the application.

v_api_users_description: This section presents components and features related to user management.
v_api_users_search_description: This component allows searching for users with an interactive search interface. It offers the ability to search by full name or username, with infinite pagination and dropdown display. This component is part of the Vuemann Users API.
v_api_users_search_demo_note: In this demonstration page, user data is simulated. The component uses a custom callback to avoid needing protected API routes. Available surnames: Martin, Dubois.
